titleInfo.title: The energy dependence of single particle spectra in e +e - annihilation

mods.abstract: We present explicit predictions of the statistical bootstrap model for inclusive single particle spectra in e +e - annihilation. The distribution ([omega]/[sigma] tot·[Epsilon]) (d[sigma]/[rho] 2d[rho]) is found to become, for [Epsilon] 3 GeV, a function only of the secondary energy [omega], independent of the incident e +e -energy [Epsilon].
